Making the game

Ghost of Tsushima, the new open-world game from the Sucker Punch company that takes us to feudal Japan. Discover how it was made together with Creative Director Nate Fox y el Art Director Jason Connel. Visit our latest releases, both patches and exclusive content that includes cooperative missions and new items.

Talk with the directors

Ghost of Tsushima - Version 1.1

Update 1.1 is a free update for all Ghost of Tsushima players. This update brings the release of Ghost of Tsushima: Legends, a new cooperative multiplayer mode inspired by Japanese mythology, as well as exciting new updates for the single-player campaign.
